headline: Where this large cap portfolio manager sees opportunity now
summary: Looking for a large-cap stock to invest in? In the video above, Macquarie Large Cap Growth Team senior portfolio manager Brad Klapmeyer shares some of the sectors and stocks he's taking a closer look at. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.
